author: Life Noggin
description:
Do we actually get meaner as we age, or is your brain just changing behind the scenes? Let's dive in and break down what happens in your brain over time and how the myth of grumpy grandpa actually works!

Subscribe to our P a t r e o n:   / lifenoggin  

Watch more Life Noggin "What Happens When You Go To Sleep Sad?" ▶▶ https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3HanWvA1R2Q
